thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 11 of 496
thread.title: Robyn

author: Robyn
title: Robyn
text: This is my second time ordering bags and backing boards for prints and unframed original artwork and the quality is outstanding. The shipping was extremely fast and they arrived within 2 days of ordering. Thank you for making a product affordable for small businesses and artists who are entrepreneurs. These work great to protect pieces when I participate in outdoor artist markets and when shipping work from sales on Etsy.
